column3:
I don't think simply adding `r` here is correct.
```python
>>> "The LevelDB Authors\. All rights reserved\.
" == r"The LevelDB Authors\. All rights reserved\.
"
False
```
A raw string will contain *literal* \.
`` which is not the intent here.
the problem here is that the `.` should not be escaped, not that the string is not raw !
